description: Data for Minecraft Java Edition addons.

interpolate.description: If true, Minecraft generates additional frames between frames with a frame time greater than 1 between them. Defaults to false.

width.description: The width of the tile, as a direct ratio rather than in pixels. This is unused in vanilla's files but can be used by resource packs to have frames that are not perfect squares.

height.description: The height of the tile in direct pixels, as a ratio rather than in pixels. This is unused in vanilla's files but can be used by resource packs to have frames that are not perfect squares.

frametime.description: Sets the default time for each frame in increments of one game tick. Defaults to 1.

frames.description: Contains a list of frames. Defaults to displaying all the frames from top to bottom.

anyOf.description: A number corresponding to position of a frame from the top, with the top frame being 0

index.description: A number corresponding to position of a frame from the top, with the top frame being 0

time.description: The time in ticks to show this frame, overriding "frametime" above.

hat.description: Whether the villager type's hat layer should still render (default), or not full

blur.description: Causes the texture to blur when viewed from close up. Defaults to false

clamp.description: Causes the texture to stretch instead of tiling in cases where it otherwise would, such as on the shadow. Defaults to false

mipmaps.description: Custom mipmap values for the texture
